home.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
home.subtitle: Quality-first developer with a unique QA leadership background

about.title: About Me
about.description: Self-taught Full-Stack Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience, including 5+ years in QA and project management leadership, and 3+ years in development. I specialize in modern web technologies with a unique quality-first development approach. I have a proven track record of building high-traffic applications serving 100K+ daily users and maintaining enterprise-grade SaaS platforms. I am a continuous learner with expertise gained through hands-on experience and structured online education.

stats.yearsDesc: Total industry experience across development and QA
stats.usersDesc: Daily users of applications developed and maintained
stats.bugsDesc: Critical production bugs across major QA projects

lookIntoThierEyes.title: Look Into Their Eyes
lookIntoThierEyes.description: Is a bilingual (Hebrew/English) web exhibition showcasing the work of Israeli graffiti artist Benzi Brofman, with a focus on paintings created after the October 7th tragedy. The site serves as a memorial platform to raise awareness for the hostages taken during this event.

jaMoveo.title: JaMoveo
jaMoveo.description: Is a collaborative musical rehearsal application that enables musicians to practice together virtually. The application serves as a digital platform for musical groups where participants with different instruments can view the same songs simultaneously, with each user seeing customized content based on their instrument (vocalists see only lyrics, while instrumentalists see both chords and lyrics).

reportsManager.title: Reports Manager
reportsManager.description: A comprehensive reporting system for small businesses with modules for customer relationships, and financial reporting.

description: Designed and developed full-stack web applications using Next.js and modern React patterns.
Built and maintained enterprise desktop applications using WPF and .NET framework.
Implemented automated deployment workflows using GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines.
Drove project success through effective client communication and timely delivery.
Developed and maintained high-traffic web applications using Angular and React.
Led technical training sessions for 50+ developers on RxJS.
Created complex components used by 10+ teams, reducing development time.
Built scalable microservices using Node.js, NestJS, and Scala.
Built regression testing framework for embedded real-time systems.
Led QA for 3+ major platform projects with zero critical production bugs.
Established and maintained company-wide QA standards and processes.
Acted as a consultant for complex technical challenges, enhancing team problem-solving capabilities.
